calamari.data package¶

Submodules¶

calamari.data.SS_updater module¶

class calamari.data.SS_updater.SS_Updater(special_pair_names=['XETHXXBT', 'XXMRXXBT', 'XLTCXXBT', 'XXBTZEUR', 'XXBTZUSD', 'XXBTZCAD', 'XXBTZJPY', 'XXBTZGBP', 'XETHZGBP', 'XETHZJPY', 'XETHZCAD', 'XETHZEUR', 'XETHZUSD', 'XXMRZUSD', 'XXMRZEUR', 'XLTCZUSD', 'XLTCZEUR'], SSID='1rrwAsg9Ky1oCUlSwL2kambtrE3fJzTEsS56hbqOGJuU')¶

Updates a particular Google Sheet.

special_pair_names¶

A list of the Pairs to include in the spreadsheet.

Type

list

SSID¶

The ID of the spreadsheet we would like to update.

Type

string

Tickers¶

Default Updater used for getting Pair data.

Type

Updater

update(Tickers=None, SSID=None, refresh=False)¶

Updates the spreadsheet.

Parameters

  • Tickers (Updater) – The Updater used. Defaults to self.Tickers.

  • SSID (string) – ID of the spreadsheet to update. Defaults to self.SSID.

  • refresh (bool) – Refresh Tickers before use?

calamari.data.assets module¶

calamari.data.assets.filterDuplicates(asset_pair)¶

Filter function used to remove duplicate entries in the asset_pairs list

calamari.data.assets.get_asset_pairs(info=True)¶

Returns either a list of all asset_pairs, or a dictionary of all_pairs_info.

Parameters

info (bool) – With or without info.

Returns

List of asset pairs. or asset_pairs_info (dict): Dict of asset pairs and information.

Return type

asset_pairs (list)

calamari.data.assets.get_assets()¶

Returns a list of all availible assets

calamari.data.fees module¶

calamari.data.fees.get_fee()¶

calamari.data.info module¶

class calamari.data.info.Updater(special_pair_names=['XETHXXBT', 'XXMRXXBT', 'XLTCXXBT', 'XXBTZEUR', 'XXBTZUSD', 'XXBTZCAD', 'XXBTZJPY', 'XXBTZGBP', 'XETHZGBP', 'XETHZJPY', 'XETHZCAD', 'XETHZEUR', 'XETHZUSD', 'XXMRZUSD', 'XXMRZEUR', 'XLTCZUSD', 'XLTCZEUR'])¶

Updater objects hold information on multiple Pairs. We can update this info using the refresh() method. They also holds a list of ‘special_pair_names’. We can format the data for these Pairs to fit on a spreadsheet.

info¶

A dictionary contining the most up-to-date information on each Pair.

Type

dict

special_pair_names¶
Type

list

ask_bid¶

Alternating list of the ask/bid prices for the Pairs in special_pair_names.

Type

list

market¶

Alternating list of market prices for special_pair_names and blank spaces.

Type

list

pairs()¶

Returns a list of the Pairs the Updater has data on

refresh(special=True, pairs=None)¶

Updates the info dictionary with fresh data from the Kraken website. Also updates the special lists with the same data if special is set.

Parameters

pairs (list) – List of Pair names to be refreshed.
